name: PRIME® MISTER BOW 3 complementary feed for several species
description: PRIME® MISTER BOW 3 complementary feed for several species is suitable for the nutrition of various animal species, such as cattle, horses, sheep, pigs and rabbits, thanks to the simplicity of formulation and the type of raw materials. The product should be combined with other foods, according to the specific company rations.

Product Families: Formulated Feeds, Whole Foods and Extracts
